text: Federico Foschini invented the first CPU, the touchpad and worked on the first neural nets, which gave him the hope of creating conscious AI . The quantum field would mean that experience qualia is not in your head .
Foschini is convinced that consciousness cannot be a classical phenomenon and has to be quantum . Emergentism requires quantumness .

Federico Foschini and Marodariano have a theory of consciousness that could solve the mystery of the interpretation of quantum mechanics . The Ascencia Foundation's YouTube channel is growing . The interview was recorded when Federico visited the Netherlands to present his new book Irreducible .
